summary: A fully player friendly home for the Dragonborn located on top of a mountain next to \"Lake Ilinalta\".
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/41275-1-1377862922.jpg[/img]
[center] [color=white] by bloodlyflags2 and MKNax [/color] [/center]


[line]


[color=yellow] [size=6] [u] DESCRIPTION [/u] [/size] [/color]

Waterfall Sky Lodge is a fully player friendly home for YOU in Skyrim inspired by Black Briar Lodge. You have many opportunities. Sitting in front of your fireplace on stormy days, feeling like a boss on your throne, relaxing in your pool or enjoying the magnificent view from your own personal observation tower. 


[line]


[color=yellow] [size=6] [u] FEATURES [/u] [/size] [/color]


Exterior: 

-located on top of a mountain, only reachable through a secret tunnel
-Observation tower with awesome view
-2 terraces at the cliff of the mountain (one has a throne so you can 
relax while watching the sunset)
-little creek behind the house
-windmill behind the house
-comfortable camp near the mountain
-2 waterfalls
-whirlpool behind the house

Interior:

-Overall 76 chests, 11 mannequins, 7 weapon plaques (5 double sword + shield plaques)
-room with forge, smelter, enchanting table, tanning rack, workbench, sharpening wheel, alchemy lab
-big room with many treasures, mannequins and  weapon racks
-big pool
-lounge
-big dining room
-hidden entrance to the secret tunnel
-6 book shelves
-2 cooking areas
-3 chimneys
-Scripted light switch in the basement
-vault inside of the secret tunnel with many safes and chests

BONUS FEATURE:
-Background story for the house


[line]


[color=yellow] [size=6] [u] INSTALLATION [/u] [/size] [/color]

Nexus Mod Manager

or
	
manual installation:
1. open your downloaded \'WaterfallSkyLodge\' with WinRaR or 7zip
2. open your Skyrim folder (/Steam/Steamapps/common/Skyrim)
3. drag and drop the DATA folder into your Skyrim folder
4. Start the Launcher and go to Data Files and check the file
 

[line]


[color=yellow] [size=6] [u] REQUIREMENTS [/u] [/size] [/color]


SKSE 1.6.16
http://skse.silverlock.org/

Skyrim Patch 1.9.32.0.8 


[line]


[color=yellow] [size=6] [u] BUGS AND KNOWN ISSUES [/u] [/size] [/color]

No Bugs or know issues at this moment.
If you discover a bug write it in the comments or PM me so that i can fix the problem.


[line]


[color=yellow] [size=6] [u] CHANGELOG [/u] [/size] [/color]

V1_1
-Bug fixes with the Bandits

V1_2
-Fixed bugs that changed the names of some interiors

V1_3
-more furniture
-more beautiful
-trophies
-a stair from the camp up to the house
-biger camp
-follower at the camp
-smoke outlet on the roof
-NavMesh inside and outside (follower friendly) 


[line]


[color=red] [size=6] [u] PERMISSIONS [/u] [/size] [/color]

You are NOT allowed to upload this file on any other website without my permission.
You are NOT allowed to public this file under your name.
author: bloodlyflags2
